price: Wͻde mmirika tεntε na εbεkͻ Ɔfrεfoͻ no hͻ. (Saa Da no) boniayεfoͻ no bεka sε: ”Saa Da yi yε Ɛda a emu yε den! “
arabic: مُّهۡطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِۖ يَقُولُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا يَوۡمٌ عَسِرٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: muh'ṭiʿīna ilā al-dāʿi yaqūlu al-kāfirūna hādhā yawmun ʿasirun
